phrases: No matter what you say, you are the criminal who hurt my brother!
That is why you will die.
You are an offering to a more just world.
Izuku Midoriya - Quirk: One For All
I came to save you, Iida!
The two of us will protect them!
I have inherited my brother's name.
If you want us to stop, then stand up!
Do you know the Turbo Hero, Ingenium?
He is a really popular hero who has 65 sidekicks working at his Tokyo agency!
He is a likable hero who honors the rules and leads people.
I set my sights on being a hero because I want to be like my brother.
Look properly at what you want to be!
It is the name of the hero who will defeat you!
What kind of hero am I?
In order to teach him a lesson, I used my brother's name.
I only saw what was in front of me...
I could not see anything except myself...!
Tenya, you want to be a hero, too?
Will you tell me something for my future reference?
Why do you continue working as a hero?
Well, our grandfather and parents were all heroes,
so I was expected to be a hero by those around me.
If someone sees a lost child,
they take the child to the service counter for lost children.
I think people like that are the coolest.
Then why did not you decide to work at the service counter for lost children?
Think about what I am saying!
You really take everything literally, huh?
You are way smarter and more athletic than I was at your age, so...
If you admire me, Tenya, then I might be an amazing hero.
It is just as you say, Hero Killer.
I cannot hold a candle to them!
I would like to see you dodge this!
You are too focused on your Quirk.
If I do not stand right now...
That Quirk is not as great as I thought.
Todoroki, Midoriya, this has nothing to do with you two, and I apologize.
That is why I cannot allow you two to bleed more than this!
It is no use trying to be reformed for appearance's sake.
A person's essence does not change so easily.
You will never be anything but a fake who prioritizes his own selfish desires.
You are a cancer to society that warps the idea of heroes.
Iida, do not listen to the logic of a murderer.
I have no right to call myself a hero...
If I give in, then Ingenium will die.
The hero killer is after me and that kid in white armor, right?
It would be better if you ran away!
It does not look like he will give me an opening to do that.
There is the uncertain element of blood type, and he needs to get in close for it to work.
On top of that, it does not last very long...
Looking at just his Quirk, he is not especially powerful.
Taking on multiple opponents alone must be hard for him to deal with.
He is gotten desperate trying to kill Iida and this person before the pros come.
Did I break the radiator during my kick earlier?
I am not used to it with my left yet.
I will throw away my arm!
Affiliation: YOU.A. High School Hero Class 1-A Birthday: 8/22 Height: 179 cm Blood Type: A Likes: Beef Stew
He can run very fast using the engines in his calves.
Affiliation: Unknown Birthday: Unknown Height: Unknown Blood Type: Unknown Likes: Unknown
Not faster than I can handle!
Pro Hero - Gran Torino - Quirk: Jet
I do not know who you are, honored elder,
but leave the rest to me.
It is because I am a hero.
Even though I used a lower temperature as a warning,
this is the first time anyone's been able to stay conscious after being on the receiving end.
But since the damage from the absorption remains...
It is just a small fry's Quirk!
I see, so that is how it is.
Those two bystanders ran away, right?
It is been a while, so my control's not great...
Huh, you are not bad, honored elder.
There should be a lot of heroes gathered over there.
It is been at least two or three minutes.
Even though they are all gathered there...
Let us restrain this guy quickly and turn him over to the police so we can go help!
I will show you what it means to be a hero!
-Do not look at your phone, look at me!
If you finish what you are doing or find any free pros, send them there.
I am leaving you to take care of the trouble.
I am sure you will be able to resolve it quickly.
My friend might be in trouble...
Leave that villain to my sidekicks.
Honored elder, go now to the address I will give you.
I, Endeavor, will be sufficient support for those over there by myself.
Did I release a little too much power?
It is not broken... is it?
This time, you, as a criminal-
He is probably knocked out after all that... right?
Then, let us restrain him and get out to the street.
Is there anything to tie him up with?
Just in case, let us take all his weapons off him.
Let us all attack him at once!
Those heroes with Quirks that are not effective against the villain,
go to Ekou Street, District 4 to help there!
There is a villain there, too?
I do not know, but I am counting on you!
I will not let you get away!
Let me do this, at least.
You can find anything at a trash collection site.
Your arms are all messed up, right?
Even though I am a pro, I was just in the way.
No, I do not think you could have done anything
one-on-one with the hero killer's Quirk.
Fighting three-on-one with the guy making mistakes himself, we still barely won.
He was probably flustered and forgot about Midoriya's recovery time.
And he was not able to deal with Iida's last Reciproburst or Midoriya's movements.
Now, let us quickly get him to the police-
I thought I told you to stay seated on the bullet train!
The hero I am interning with, Gran Torino.
I was told to come here all of a sudden.
Well, I do not really know what is going on, but I am glad you are okay.
Jeez, this part of him is also exactly like Toshinori.
Endeavor told us there was a request for help here, but...
I will call an ambulance right away!
Do not tell me... it is the hero killer?
If you prop me up, I can...
The ambulance will be here soon!
You were injured because of me.
I could not... see anything... through my anger...
Even though you were feeling so cornered, I did not notice at all.
You are the class rep, right?
The fight against the hero killer probably only took about ten minutes.
But to us, it felt like a very long fight-
Did he escape here after being beaten?
Oh no, if he get's too high, then I will not be able to reach him with my Quirk!
This society overgrown with fake heroes...
The idiots have come out, huh?
I will dispose of them later.
Why did that Nomu have to go and get killed?
Villain - Tomura Shigaraki - Quirk: Decay Villain - Kurogiri - Quirk: Warp Gate
There is so much I want to say that I cannot keep up!
Why will not things go the way I want?
He killed someone with no hesitation.
Anyway, get ready to fight for now!
Why are you all standing around in a group?
The villain should have escaped this way.
How are things on your end?
-But do not tell me that man is...?
Someone must be dyed in blood...
I must take back what it means to be a hero!
Try and get me, you fakes!
The only one I will let kill me is the true hero...
that a broken rib had pierced the hero killer's lung at that moment.
He had not licked anyone's blood,
but at that place, for that one moment,
the hero killer was the only one who stood up to fight against his opponent.
Why is it you, sir, and not Young Midoriya?
I said, I am All Might...
Next time, The Aftermath of Hero Killer: Stain.
That young man called Todoroki will become The Hand Crusher!
Next time: The Aftermath of Hero Killer: Stain
